definition: used with regard to idealized country life, idyllically rustic, a literary work idealizing the rural life (especially the life of shepherds)
details:
adjective
- used with regard to idealized country life, idyllically rustic
= example: used with regard to idealized country life, idyllically rustic
= synonyms: arcadian
- of or relating to a pastor
= example: of or relating to a pastor
- relating to shepherds or herdsmen or devoted to raising sheep or cattle
= example: relating to shepherds or herdsmen or devoted to raising sheep or cattle
= synonyms: bucolic
noun
- a literary work idealizing the rural life (especially the life of shepherds)
- a letter from a pastor to the congregation
- a musical composition that evokes rural life
= synonyms: idyll, idyl, pastorale
